channel.title: *~*Forum suggestions/Requests*~*
channel.description:
Well this [b]WILL[/b] get locked, but i thought of a request, a suggestions~development for the Moparscape forums.
Well i decided to make this thread for people to take the chance to share what you think will improve these [b]FORUMS[/b] not server issues.
Mine is when if thread gets locked, you should remove contents from it, as people can still view and "Add" whats in it.
Sorry mods if it's against the rules!
~Thanks you for your time~
Teric.
[b]No spamming! Will be reported![/b] [b]No flaming! Will be reported![/b]
[size=15pt]If you have a useless post, don't post at all![/size][br][size=1]Posted on: April 25, 2007, 03:38:06 PM[/size][hr]Cmon, unless this doesn't get locked, keep it alive!

[/quote]

And a few extra g mods to banz0r the idoits ;)[/quote]

item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

OwnerShadow:

Eh, I don’t think Moparscape.org is that bad. We have mods working on the spam and stuff. They just simply need to report those who don’t read the rule and we need the gmods to be more active and work on banning those people or warnning.

Compared to Moparisthebest , Moparscape is like iraq compared to some small village in the uk

Read full topic

item.title: *~*Forum suggestions/Requests*~*
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Ok for one, yes, these forums are a bit of a mess, but there easy t navigate around. And if you expect this to get stickied… yea right. It would be complete spam to have a stickied topic about what people dislike about the forums. It would just make it harder. Its fine for now. But the only problem is noobs who will ask simple questions and they will be answerd and they will start to die off and someone ends up replying again. This is a useless bump and causes spam. But anyway, yea these forums are a mess.

Read full topic
